ComicInfo.Title: Johnny's Story Part 4
ComicInfo.Series: Cobra Kai: The Karate Kid Saga Continues
ComicInfo.Summary:
See The Karate Kid in a whole new light in this retelling through the eyes of Johnny Lawrence, two-time All Valley Tournament champion. It’s the final showdown! The tournament has arrived, and Johnny aims to defend his honor against the upstart from Jersey as victory and love hang in the balance! Based on the hit YouTube Original series Cobra Kai!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Kagan McLeod | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Photo | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Netho Diaz (a) & Luis Antonio Delgado (c) | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 04:16:37. [CVDB767885]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Kagan McLeod, Luis Antonio Delgado, Netho Diaz
ComicInfo.Editor: Megan Brown, Riley Farmer, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Characters: Ali Mills , Daniel LaRusso, John Kreese, Johnny Lawrence, Mr. Miyagi
